metadata.dc:author: Clarós, P
Clarós, A
Weinberg, P
Knaster, J
metadata.dc:description: We present the case of a 13-year-old boy with intra-parotid schwannoma of the facial nerve. We discuss the histopathology, preoperative diagnosis by fine needle aspiration cytology, and surgical strategy.
metadata.dc:title: Schwannoma parotídeo.
[Parotid schwannoma].
